column1: Kumbhraj is a town in  Guna district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh. It is famous for market of coriander seeds. Kumbhraj is the largest market for coriander seeds in the Asia.
Kumbhraj name is given by Rana Kumbha.
Notable persons: Dr. Surendra Parashar a notable scientist in the field of disease diagnosis. TB
column5: and malelira are main focus of his research. He is also developing a technology of microbial lipase production from soybean waste.
